EmailTemplate.name: Notification to Delegate
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification for delegation of authority (eGreensheet)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This is to notify you that {!Approver__c.Approver_Name__c} is out of the office from {!Approver__c.From__c} to {!Approver__c.To__c} and that you have been assigned as the approval delegate for the business case approval system (eGreensheet).
Thank you.
